content:
I'd be happy to help you keep track of your pet expenses. To get started, could you please provide me with some information on the expenses you've incurred for Luna and Max recently? This might include:

* The date of the expense
* A description of the expense (e.g. food, vet visit, toys, etc.)
* The amount spent

You can share this information with me, and I can help you organize it and keep a running total of your expenses.

If you'd like, we can also set up a system to track your pet expenses moving forward. I can provide you with a template or help you create a budget category to make it easy to log your expenses and stay on top of your spending.

Let me know how I can assist you!
